description: Rescores or re-ranks search results from a search service such as OpenSearch (self managed). You use the semantic search capabilities of Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking to improve the search service's results.

parameters.name: RescoreExecutionPlanId
parameters.description: The identifier of the rescore execution plan. A rescore execution plan is an Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking resource used for provisioning the Rescore API.

parameters.name: SearchQuery
parameters.description: The input query from the search service.

parameters.name: Documents
parameters.description: The list of documents for Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking to rescore or rank on. (dict) --- Information about a document from a search service such as OpenSearch (self managed). Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking uses this information to rank and score on. The identifier of the document from the search service. GroupId (string) --- The optional group identifier of the document from the search service. Documents with the same group identifier are grouped together and processed as one document within the service. Title (string) --- The title of the search service's document. Body (string) --- The body text of the search service's document. TokenizedTitle (list) --- The title of the search service's document represented as a list of tokens or words. You must choose to provide Title or TokenizedTitle. You cannot provide both. (string) --- TokenizedBody (list) --- The body text of the search service's document represented as a list of tokens or words. You must choose to provide Body or TokenizedBody. (string) --- The original document score or rank from the search service. Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking gives the document a new score or rank based on its intelligent search algorithms.

nested_params.name: Id
nested_params.description: The identifier of the document from the search service.

nested_params.name: GroupId
nested_params.description: The optional group identifier of the document from the search service. Documents with the same group identifier are grouped together and processed as one document within the service.

nested_params.name: Title
nested_params.description: The title of the search service's document.

nested_params.name: Body
nested_params.description: The body text of the search service's document.

nested_params.name: TokenizedTitle
nested_params.description: The title of the search service's document represented as a list of tokens or words. You must choose to provide Title or TokenizedTitle. You cannot provide both.

nested_params.name: TokenizedBody
nested_params.description: The body text of the search service's document represented as a list of tokens or words. You must choose to provide Body or TokenizedBody. You cannot provide both.

nested_params.name: OriginalScore
nested_params.description: The original document score or rank from the search service. Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking gives the document a new score or rank based on its intelligent search algorithms.

nested_items.name: RescoreId
nested_items.description: The identifier associated with the scores that Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking gives to the results. Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking rescores or re-ranks the results for the search service.

nested_items.name: ResultItems
nested_items.description: A list of result items for documents with new relevancy scores. The results are in descending order.

nested_items.name: DocumentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document from the search service.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The relevancy score or rank that Amazon Kendra Intelligent Ranking gives to the result.
